endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all currently configured menus for the establishment.
Fetch details of a specific menu by its identifier.
Create a new menu with customizable options and configurations.
Update an existing menu identified by its ID with new details.
Remove a specific menu based on its ID.
List all available ingredients for menu customization.
Add new ingredients to the available pool for menu creation.
Delete a specific ingredient entry by its identifier.
Gather customer dining preferences to enhance menu recommendations.
Simulate and preview menu presentation as seen by customers.
